Title: Prohibits the sale of tobacco products and vapor products within five hundred feet of a public or private school
Summary: Prohibits the sale of tobacco products and vapor products within five hundred feet of a public or private school.
LawCode: Add ยง1399-cc-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of tobacco products and vapor products within five hundred feet of a public or private school
